game_description: The Sierra Pacific VR Xperience virtual showroom is the most incredible way to experience and interact with Sierra Pacific’s luxury doors and windows. Check out the different options for specialty doors while you immerse yourself in a beautifully designed custom home. You won’t have to just imagine what different wood species, or a painted interior would look like… you can see it for yourself in our virtual showroom.
review_1: little weak on the graphical front, but could otherwise be worse in that area. It's fairly complete and posh and I have a lot of respect for commercial VR Real Estate demos and this one defiantly tries and generally succeeds in hitting the mark. Well, I think they are just trying to sell you the windows in here.
